Markdown

February 24, 2026

https://www.markdownguide.org/basic-syntax/

Markdown Cheatsheet

A quick, practical reference for writing Markdown (GitHub-flavored where applicable).

1. Headings

# H1
## H2
### H3
#### H4
##### H5
###### H6

2. Text Formatting

**Bold**
*Italic*
***Bold & Italic***
~~Strikethrough~~
`Inline code`

Result:

  • Bold
  • Italic
  • Bold & Italic
  • Strikethrough
  • Inline code

3. Paragraphs & Line Breaks

This is a paragraph.

This is another paragraph.

Line break (GitHub-flavored): end a line with two spaces.

4. Lists

Unordered

- Item
- Item
  - Nested item

Ordered

1. First
2. Second
3. Third

Task Lists (GitHub)

- [x] Done
- [ ] Todo

5. Links

[Link text](https://example.com)

Auto Links

https://example.com

6. Images

![Alt text](image.png)

7. Code Blocks

Fenced Code Block

```js
console.log('Hello');


### Inline Code
```md
Use `npm install`

8. Blockquotes

> This is a quote
>> Nested quote

9. Horizontal Rules

---
***
___

10. Tables (GitHub)

| Name | Age | Role |
|------|-----|------|
| Sam  | 30  | Dev  |
| Lee  | 28  | PM   |

Result:

| Name | Age | Role | |——|—–|——| | Sam | 30 | Dev | | Lee | 28 | PM |


Alignment:

| Left | Center | Right |
|:-----|:------:|------:|

11. Escaping Characters

\* \_ \# \`

12. HTML in Markdown

<b>Bold</b>
<br />

13. Emojis (GitHub)

:rocket: :sparkles: :bug:

14. Footnotes (Some Parsers)

Here is a footnote reference[^1].

[^1]: Footnote text

15. Collapsible Sections (GitHub)

<details>
  <summary>Click to expand</summary>

  Hidden content
</details>

Result:

Click to expand Hidden content


16. File Extensions

  • .md
  • .markdown

17. Common Use Cases

  • README files
  • Documentation
  • GitHub issues & PRs
  • Notes & wikis

18. Markdown Gotchas

  • Blank lines matter
  • Indentation affects lists & code blocks
  • Not all parsers support all features

19. GitHub-Flavored Markdown Extras

  • Tables
  • Task lists
  • Strikethrough
  • Syntax highlighting

Tip: Keep Markdown simple—readability beats clever formatting.
